definition: fish and water (metaphor for an intimate relationship or inseparability)
surname Yu
fish/CL:條|条[tiao2],尾[wei3]
surname Shui
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
close relationship as between fish and water
the pleasure of close intimacy in a couple (idiom)/sexual intercourse

sentences.english: The army and the people are as inseparable as fish and water.
And the desire for intimacy is timeless.
sentences.chinese: 而且对鱼水之欢的渴望是永恒的。
